name: Oh! (CodingCrate)
description:
PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS VERSION, THE WEB VERSION IS REALLY BUGGY.

tickMark and me hosted this jam, so i already knew about the assets, theme and random words beforehand, but i didn't brainstorm any ideas before the jam started.

Doing taxes drains energy, so everyone draws drawings, and you have to spread the drawings with the most significance.

The goal of the game is to always choose the picture that is different and get cobos of five.

TUTORIAL:

You have to always choose the picture which is different before the timer runs out from the other pictures by using 8 buttons on your keyboard:

  • Top left: A
  • Top middle: S
  • Top right: D
  • Middle left: F
  • Middle right: H
  • Bottom left: J
  • Bottom middle: K
  • Bottom right: L

It's basically the middle row of your keyboard.

BUT sometimes, an OH! appears, if that's the case, none of the drawings are good and you aren't allowed to press anything, or you lose.

If you spread 5 correct pictures in a row, your score increases by 1.

If you have any questions, let me know in the comments. :)
